scripts.check:scripts: eslint test/** && prettier --list-different test/** && eslint scripts/** && prettier --list-different scripts/**
scripts.tidy:scripts: eslint --fix test/** && prettier --write test/** && eslint --fix scripts/** && prettier --write scripts/**
scripts.deploy-suite:test: npx hardhat run --network test scripts/deploy-suite.js  >> logs/test.deploy.contracts.txt
scripts.deploy-suite:mainnet: npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy-suite.js >> logs/mainnet.deploy.contracts.txt
scripts.deploy-suite:mumbai: npx hardhat run --network mumbai scripts/deploy-suite.js >> logs/mumbai.deploy.contracts.txt
scripts.manage-roles:mainnet: npx hardhat --network mainnet run scripts/manage-roles.js >> logs/mainnet.manage.roles.txt
scripts.manage-roles:mumbai: npx hardhat --network mumbai run scripts/manage-roles.js >> logs/mumbai.manage.roles.txt
scripts.manage-roles:test: npx hardhat --network test run scripts/manage-roles.js >> logs/test.manage.roles.txt
